org.deri.tarql

Class InputStreamSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deri.tarql.InputStreamSource

  • public abstract class InputStreamSource
extends java.lang.Object
    A source of InputStreams. Can be opened repeatedly to provide input streams over some data.

    Static methods are provided to create instances from various inputs.
